Title: Farewell to Harry
Writer: Garrett Bennett (screenplay), Garrett Bennett (story), Steve Edmiston (screenplay), Neil Weinberger (screenplay), Ann Wilkinson (additional writing)
Actors: Joe Flanigan, William Hall Jr., Lysette Anthony, Joseph Franklin
Plot: A down-and-out writer, Nick Sennet, runs into Harry, a man that, legend has it, died long ago. Together they attempt to revitalize a defunct factory as well as their lives.
